overview: Tristan, a miserable gay man, resents his lost youth and decides to end it all with a glass of poison. What he doesn't know is his antique mirror is a backdoor to hell, and his contempt has drawn out a mischievous demon, an Imp, with a dangerous proposition for him. "Imp" examines ageism of gay men, while repurposing gothic fairytales into the LGBT story.
title: Imp
